storyInfo: Juana leads the finning team into the Salt Flat to hunt a massive saltfin. Anastasio is waiting on the path of their return.

attributes.content: Thank you for dinner, Javi. It was delicious.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Señora Juana... I have some questions.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Go on then, no need to hold back.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: I feel it's a little... risky, to be hunting such a massive saltfin with the men we have.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Wouldn't it be safer to go after a school of smaller ones?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: The saltfin schools we've reeled in have been far too small. We'll need a lot more alchemical materials for what is to come.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: We've already prepared plenty.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Still far from enough. The compass was just the beginning. We'll need so much more once we enter the ocean.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Poz, the last cook, said you like to make some crazy decisions. Most of the time, it makes our blood run hot with excitement.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: But other times, it makes our blood turn to ice.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: ...Yet he was ever-loyal to me, supporting even those decisions that made him freeze up inside.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Is that what you expect from me too?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: No. Which is why he's the previous cook and you're the new one.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Do you really wish to spend the rest of your life worrying about your next meal? This is our chance. Seize it, and all our problems vanish forever.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: The ocean managed to nurture the entirety of the Golden Age, but our entire fleet can't even compare to your average gang of smugglers.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: But the Salt Flat has nurtured us for decades! It hasn't been easy, but you've led us through the years.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: The Flat is too barren for us.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: And the ocean is too dangerous for us.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Think about the townsfolk. They would like nothing more than to be rid of us, and their net draws ever closer.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: You were never afraid of them!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: It's not them that I'm afraid of.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: It's the Flat. Its ecosystem is about to collapse.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: That fissure was just the beginning. Survey teams are reporting that large voids have appeared beneath the Salt Flat, where underground rivers have dried up.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Voids?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: The underground rivers are drying up. The number of microorganisms has dropped sharply, and with it, the number of saltfins that feed upon them.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: It's been a long time since one of our finships encountered a large school of saltfins.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Why didn't you tell us?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: What was I supposed to say? That we're finished if we don't escape this place? What would that accomplish other than causing a panic?
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Is this the only way then?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: ...Yes, it's the only way.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: A little to the left... thanks.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Mmph!
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: Yes... now a little harder.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Mmph—!
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: That was a long day, learning to catch saltfins with Señor Rus... Ow, my aching shoulders...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Mm, yes, that's the spot.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Nene stomps even harder on Isidro's back as he inhales and exhales deeply.
Nene...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Mm-ph!
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: Never mind, you wouldn't understand.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: ...It's not like I don't want to help you all.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: When I was little, a beggar taught me a few tricks, just to earn scraps on the streets.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: But when I met my mentor, he told me those weren't tricks.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: It was alchemy.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Mm... hmph...
attributes.name: Nene

attributes.content: I was fascinated by alchemical studies. It earned me praise from my mentor, and recognition from my peers.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: And most importantly, I was no longer a street urchin with nothing to my name.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I was worth something.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: That is, until I learned the most fundamental nature of that school of alchemy...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Isidro pauses. Nene stops stomping and looks up perplexedly.

attributes.text: You can never abandon what you have, Isidro.
You fear you will go back to having nothing if you fail.
But the nature of alchemy is to achieve your goal, devoting everything to it, no matter the cost.
The stakes, everything... The return, a chance.
Why is it that only our alchemy was used to sail the seas? Because the ocean demands such quality.

attributes.content: Sensing Isidro's depression, Nene lies down on his back and chirps gently.
Rus was right. You all just want to live a decent life. Repairing the compass and going to sea... It's not worth the risk.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: But I'm curious... how exactly is Juana's compass constructed?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: The Corazonix inside... does it truly point towards whatever your heart yearns for the most, as the stories say?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: If I just had the chance to study it...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Did you fall asleep?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I'm curious. What's going on in my own heart?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Flowers?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Doctor Añora was the first to plant them in town, decades ago. For use in ointments.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Ah... I have seen them before, in the halls of the Bastión de Cánticos.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: I've never been.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: All I know is that it is the first flower to bloom from the salted earth of Aarón, after so many years of being besieged by the sea.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: The townsfolk used to give me these, as a token of appreciation I think.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Now, I feel I should be offering them to you.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: No, señor, I am unworthy.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Had you not taken those... measures towards the caravans, to obtain the predator burdenbeasts...
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: We could never have gone after those despicable bandits in the Salt Flat.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: I did no more than what must be done.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Your duty, of course.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: I believe you mentioned you are after a forbidden relic the bandits have stolen.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: What sort of relic could it possibly be, to bring you all the way to this barren land?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: A... compass.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: There are thousands of antique compasses from old Iberia.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: None like this. This one corrupts the heart.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: It points towards the user's deepest desires, dredged from the depths of the heart... Or so it is said.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: But those who cast their eyes towards such base desires can never turn back.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: It drives them to theft, robbery, murder. They cannot stop themselves, try as they might.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: ...You really think so?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: It is simply the truth.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Is this what you've been preaching to the townsfolk these past few days?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: It was not I who preached. The people here already understood this truth, more profoundly than I ever have.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Someone had already revealed it to them. Perhaps you?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: ...Yes, it was me.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: It was I who issued those prohibitions.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Why stop then? Why lift the prohibition?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Look at this town. No one here dares touch the new goods and technologies that the caravans bring. No one dares leave their house after dark.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: They dare not fill their stomachs... even in years of plenty.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Every word I used to shackle these poor people has continued to shackle them.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: They see it differently.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Was it not your deeds that helped them lay aside their dreams and laments for wealth and power. Was it not your words that encouraged them to take up the hoe and the scythe?
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Times have changed, Señor Alguacil.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Times never change, Señor Calificador.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: The deepest desires of the heart should never be probed. Not by anyone, not anywhere.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Never.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Saltfins ahoy!
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: Two meters wide, eighteen long!
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: Now that's a big one. Chase 'em down!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Full speed ahead! Harpoons ready!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Hard to port! Full speed!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Harpoons up! Hey, ho!♪
In the waves the big one rolls!♪
Stomp the planks! Hoist the sails!♪
Drown the high wind's wail!♪
Hey, ho! Up we go!♪
Before the sun sinks low!♪
Wha'cha watching from a corner for, chaval?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Oh, nothing...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Ugh!
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Watch yourself. But the shaking is a good thing. Means we're getting close.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Where'd the boss put you? Reeling in the net from here, or joining the hunt in the salts?
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Señora Juana won't let me leave the ship.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I don't get it. With your swordhand, you'd be way more useful in the hunt.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: She didn't give me any particular job either. Just told me to do whatever I can.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: Weird. She's usually so detailed.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Maybe the standards are laxer for the new guy?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I see it!
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: Finshit... that's a BIG one...
attributes.name: Composed Sailor

attributes.content: Lower the boat! Don't let it get away!
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: Wait, it's turning!
attributes.name: Composed Sailor

attributes.content: Full rudder! It's running into us!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Not in the best mood, big guy? Well, my mood couldn't be better.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Change of plans, Perlita. Javier stays aboard. I'll lead the hunt myself.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: But señora, you haven't led a hunt in ages.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Do as I say!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Javier! Come back! Take the helm!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: It's too dangerous, señora!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: This one's too much for you, Javi. Stay on the ship. I need you to work with me.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Then what should I do?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: See that salt reef in the shape of a tongue? Herd it there with salt rounds. I'll handle the rest.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Aye aye.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Full rudder! Hang tight!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: The salt ship makes a hard turn to starboard, but not quite quickly enough to avoid brushing against the side of the charging saltfin.
Cold sweat rolls down everyone's backs at the grating sound. Hanging onto a fence for dear life, Isidro looks towards where the sound came from.
He sees a massive saltfin swim past the ship, sending stinging salt grains flying across the deck.
How could a saltfin grow this big?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: I thought that last one was the biggest I'd ever see...
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: No, chaval... Even I've never seen one this big.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: We never hunt ones this big, not by choice.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: This is loco! We're in way over our heads!
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Load! Aim! Fire!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Port broadside! Fire!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Aim for the eyes and nostril! Hitting the shell won't do a damn thing!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Is Señora Juana in position?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Boss! Boss!
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: She just went down!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: You gotta stop the hunt! We're in way over our heads!
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: And how would we eat tomorrow if we don't hunt today?
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: What's the matter, Rus?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: It's twice as big as any other saltfin. Only the leader of a school could grow this big.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: So you'd expect it to have a whole school behind it, but I sure don't see one.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Get to the point, professor.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Either it lost its school, or it was abandoned. Either way, it's mad. Real mad.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Does Señora Juana know about this?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: It was her plan.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: She's toying with our lives again. If that thing decides to bring us down with it, we're all—
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Mm...
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Teach...
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Señora and the hunting team have already left. It's too late to back down.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Don't let the rest of the crew know. We can't afford a panic.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Keep firing, Javier.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: I'd rather die on a hunt today than of starvation in a month.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Boss... Can we really take on this big guy?
attributes.name: Nervous Sailor

attributes.content: Of course. And we'll win.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Wait for it to turn and aim for gaps in its shell! If you can hit the nostril, all the better!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: It's coming straight for us!
attributes.name: Nervous Sailor

attributes.content: Row! Hard forward!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Aye aye!
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: Harpoons ready! ...Now!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Argh!
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: Good! Keep it up!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: It's too strong! I can't hold this rope much longer!
attributes.name: Nervous Sailor

attributes.content: I'm with you!
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: All hands! Again!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Argh!
attributes.name: Sailors

attributes.content: Good! Someone hit the nostril!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Hold that rope like your life depends on it!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Hah!
attributes.name: Sailors

attributes.content: Thirty meters left!
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: Keep holding on!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Twenty meters!
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: Ten meters!
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: We're out of rope!
attributes.name: Nervous Sailor

attributes.content: Just a little more!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: It's coming out of the salt layer!
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: Now! Reel it in!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Juana rides her boat towards the saltfin as the rope is reeled in. Its thick hide has been pierced by dozens of harpoons, blood seeping out from the wounds.
Listening to its heavy, rapid breathing, Juana knows that its life is coming to an end.

She cannot help but place her hand on the massive figure, feeling its life flow out of it little by little, until the saltfin closes its eyes, still raging against the dying of the light with its last breath.
Phew... finally.
attributes.name: Nervous Sailor

attributes.content: We did it!
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: ...Hail the salt ship. Have them come for us.
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Aye aye!
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: Wait!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: Look out, señora!
attributes.name: Nervous Sailor

attributes.content: It's not dead yet...
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: Juana feels a gaze filled with overwhelming malice upon her.
She looks up at its eyes, filled with hatred and anger.
The next instant, the saltfin begins flailing violently, sending blood-stained salt flying, falling over the sailors like rain.
It breaks free of the ropes, leaving behind only the harpoons still impaled in its hide.
It raises its tail fin high.
Retreat! Retreat!
attributes.name: Nervous Sailor

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: Several boats are quickly snapped in two by the saltfin's attack, and the air is filled with the screams of injured sailors.
The sound seems to fill Juana with a certain resolve. She charges towards the rampaging saltfin, and grabs one of the harpoons on its back.
It leaps up, trying to shake her off.
It's too dangerous, señora! Let go!
attributes.name: Excited Sailor

attributes.content: No! This one is mine, as long as I still breathe!
attributes.name: Juana

attributes.content: The saltfin sweeps aside the boats in front of it and swims into the distance, carrying Juana on its back.
It does so with astounding speed, like an arrow from a bow, or a dying star.
Faster!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: We have to catch it!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Stop! Stop! That's as far as we can go! The beast dragged Juana into the Skeletal Reef!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Javier... Javier...
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: You were right, Rus. I shouldn't have knocked you out.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Not the first time. I know how you can get.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: But listen for once... We can't chase her. The steam in Skeletal Reef will tear our ship apart.
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: If you won't go, give me a boat. I'll find her.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: No one survives that place! Not us, not...
attributes.name: Rus

attributes.content: Juana can.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Are you with me or not, Teach?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Don't be reckless, Javier!
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: You're just gonna let her die?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: No one wants to lose our leader. But we can't lose you too.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: She liked you. If something happens to her, you have a responsibility for what comes next.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: I'll go.
attributes.name: Teach

attributes.content: Maybe so, Teach. But she won't die. I won't let her!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Who's with me?!
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: Count me in!
attributes.name: Bold Sailor

attributes.content: And me!
attributes.name: Loyal Sailor

attributes.content: Would you mind if I join you?
The sailors part to let Isidro through.
If it isn't our resident alchemist. I figured you'd keep your mouth shut forever.
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: What could you possibly do, chaval?
attributes.name: Javier

attributes.content: I can help you get out of that valley alive.
attributes.name: Isidro

attributes.content: We're ready, Señor Silver.
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: Good. Take them in at my command.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Warrior Priest

attributes.content: ...Are you sure those bandits will pass through here, Señor Alguacil?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Yes... they're short on supplies.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Saltfins are their only food source in the Salt Flat. From what the caravans tell us, they must travel through this passage when they return from a hunt.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Exhausted by their quarry, they will be no match for us.
attributes.name: Anastasio

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: With this ambush, it will all be over.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Things will improve in town once we have the bandits' technology and supplies.
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Right, Anastasio?
attributes.name: Silver

attributes.content: Anastasio mutters something, but Silver does not hear it.
He simply gazes upon the vast Salt Flat before him, as if seeing the town's prosperous future out there.
